project-description_metagenome_name: Low Salinity Microbial Metagenome San Diego Bay Saltern 11/28/05
sample-isolation-and-treatment_sample_is: Water samples from the solar saltern of South Bay Salt Works (Chula Vista, CA, USA) were collected from three ponds with different salinities: low (6-8%), medium (12-14%), and high (27-30%). Salinity was measured with a hand refractometer. The time between samplings ranged from 1 day to ~1.33 years (Table 1).
